title: What do i do my account is unloginable
body: I had to reinstall LOL and i had to log in again so it was downloading in the top left corner and I used my same username and password and it told me to make a new name and i did. I am still logged in on my phone but not anywhere else. WHAT DO I DO

replies.body:
I pulled up your account to see what might be going on with your Summoner name. It looks like this account was created pretty recently. The first time you log in, the client will have you create your actual Summoner Name for the first time (which is different from your username). 

Hit me back up if that wasn't the issue you were having!
